price: E concedeu-vos de tudo que Lhe pedistes. E, se contais as graças de Allah, não podereis enumerá- las. Por certo, o ser humano é injusto, ingrato.
arabic: وَءَاتَىٰكُم مِّن كُلِّ مَا سَأَلۡتُمُوهُۚ وَإِن تَعُدُّواْ نِعۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ لَا تُحۡصُوهَآۗ إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَظَلُومٞ كَفَّارٞ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: waātākum min kulli mā sa-altumūhu wa-in taʿuddū niʿ'mata al-lahi lā tuḥ'ṣūhā inna al-insāna laẓalūmun kaffārun
translations: you will (be able to) count them
